website_summaries.verdict: Feels great against the skin and is designed for comfort for all levels.
pros: Features blind stitching and glued seams for less chafing
Leg panels specially designed for fast transitions
Comfortable for those who are new to the triathlon world
Full-bodied and designed to maximize the ability of many body types
cons: Not the most sophisticated in terms of design details

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Edit 2020 The neck rubs and cuts up my neck pretty bad. I love the rest of the suit but after a long swim my neck is in pretty bad shape. Old review My wife and I both purchased these suits and I have used it for a year now and I can say that its our favorite suit we have ever had. I use it for recreational swimming and for triathlons. It is smooth in the water and keeps your butt and legs up to create less drag. The price is awesome and I would recommend this to anyone looking for a reliable suit at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: My kids can't move his arms in this wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: The first time my kid tried on this websuit in open water swim, he has to take it off and would rather swim in the cold water as he can not move his arms, it hurts his arms so badly and make his swim much slower. Now we can't even return it as they don't allow return once it's in the water. But how can you tell if you don't try it on in the water?
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price. I am tall and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price. I am tall and could not find a reasonably priced suit that works. This worked well and was only minimally restrictive, and I am just under 6'6".
customer_reviews.author: The Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a good price ! arrived in time !
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Follow chart when it comes to weight.
customer_reviews.text: Follow chart for weight. Work well for first swim. Happy with price and performance so far.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Anderson

customer_reviews.title: ... wetsuit for my first triathlon and this one was perfect. I have used it now a few times ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wetsuit for my first triathlon and this one was perfect. I have used it now a few times and it fits great and I haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks and feels good, cant give it a 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: looks and feels good, cant give it a 5 stars, because this is my first wetsuit, and so far so good, price is good, and delivery was fast
customer_reviews.author: LeonDelMonte

customer_reviews.title: Size chart not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a product to be measured in store, because the table chart is not accurate. Not recommended for buying it through this channel.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Vega Alcocer

customer_reviews.title: Loyal, happy customer! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second suit from this vendor and I love it!! I received it so quick after ordering it and it fits so comfortably! This suit is so well designed and is perfect for racing in colder temp waters. It is obvious that the design and fit has been well thought through and by fellow triathletes. I used my other suit for 4 seasons and loved it! I am so excited to race again this season in my Fit2race wetsuit!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan D.

customer_reviews.title: Fits very snug. At first thought it was too small but turns out it’s just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality we suit. Used it last week in 63 degree water and was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

product_meta.title: Fit2Race Kids Youth Triathlon Wetsuit - F2R Sockeye Fullsleeve Unisex
product_meta.description: The Sockeye is designed to complement efficient and fast swimming with sleek aquatic qualities. Built with 5mm rubber thickness in the front chest and legs, 3mm in the back shoulders and 2mm in the arms and under arm gussets. Capitalizing on the aquatic qualities of rubber, the forearm catch panel blends 5mm rubber into its design. Glide, catch and lift yourself into potentially the fastest suit ever made. Escape transitions in effortless motion with our new flexible designed inner jersey. See what is winning races around the world.
feature_bullets: SUITABLE FOR ALL LEVELS - Ironman approved. Comes in a wide range of unisex sizes to ensure a perfect fit.
SUPER COMFORTABLE - Blind stitching and glued seams for less chafing. Lamination process marries rubber to a nylon & polyester weave combination for flexibility and friction free movement.
PROVEN TECHNOLOGY EQUALS SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE – 5mm rubber thickness in the front chest and legs, 3mm in the back shoulders and 2mm in the arms and underarm gussets.
EXCEPTIONAL FUNCTIONALITY - Forearm catch panel blends 5mm rubber into its design. Leg panels specially designed for fast transitions.
CUSTOMER SATISFACTION - 30-Day Guarantee: If you are not 100% satisfied within 30-days, send it back for a full refund.
